<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Champion Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=686) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
<trait label="Multiclass" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=115" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 223 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Champion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=4)

**Prerequisites**
Strength 14; Charisma 14

</column>

---

Choose a deity and [cause](/classes/champion/causes) as you would if you were a champion. You become trained in light, medium, and heavy armor. You become trained in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) and your deity’s associated skill; for each of these skills in which you were already trained, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You become trained in champion class DC.

 You are bound by your deity’s anathema and must follow the champion’s code and alignment requirements for your cause. You don’t gain any other abilities from your choice of deity or cause.

**Special** You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the champion archetype.

<title level="2">Champion Dedication leads to...</title>
[Basic Devotion](/Feats.aspx?ID=687), [Champion Resiliency](/Feats.aspx?ID=688), [Champion's Reaction](/Feats.aspx?ID=691), [Diverse Armor Expert](/Feats.aspx?ID=693), [Divine Ally](/Feats.aspx?ID=692), [Healing Touch](/Feats.aspx?ID=689)
name: Champion Dedication
